mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRO_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_REALPRICE, PRO_DISPRICE , PRO_REGDATE, PRO_MILEGE, PRO_STOCKCOUNT , PRO_PCL_NO, PRO_MKR_NO) VALUES (#{pro_no} , #{pro_name} , #{pro_disprice}, #{pro_disprice}, SYSDATE , FLOOR(#{pro_disprice}*0.005) , #{pro_stockcount}, #{pro_pcl_no}, #{pro_mkr_no})
INSERT INTO PRO_SUMM (PSM_NO, PSM_CONENT, PSM_PRO_NO) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(PSM_NO), 0)+1 FROM PRO_SUMM) , #{psm_conent} , #{pro_no})
INSERT INTO PRO_IMG (PMG_NO, PMG_FILE, PMG_PRO_NO, PMG_IDT_NO) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(PMG_NO), 0)+1 FROM PRO_IMG) , #{pmg_file}, #{pmg_pro_no}, #{pmg_idt_no})
INSERT INTO PRO_DET (PDT_NO, PDT_NAME, PDT_CONENT, PDT_STEP, PDT_PRO_NO) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(PDT_NO), 0)+1 FROM PRO_DET) , #{pdt_name}, #{pdt_conent}, 5, #{pdt_pro_no})
mapper.select: SELECT PRO_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_DISPRICE, PRO_REALPRICE, PRO_MILEGE , TO_CHAR(PRO_DISPRICE, '999,999,999,999')||'원' PRO_CH_PRICE , TO_CHAR(PRO_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') PRO_REGDATE , PSM_CONENT , PMG_FILE , MKR_NAME , PRO_PCL_NO , PRO_MKR_NO , PRO_STOCKCOUNT FROM PRODUCT JOIN PRO_SUMM ON PRO_NO = PSM_PRO_NO JOIN PRO_IMG ON PRO_NO = PMG_PRO_NO JOIN MAKER ON PRO_MKR_NO = MKR_NO WHERE PRO_NO = #{pro_no} AND PMG_IDT_NO = 2
